requestParams.name: retail_source
requestParams.desc: 零售调用来源（调用方和有赞约定的值）

requestDemos.code:
token = auth.Token(token='token') #auth.Sign(app_id='app_id', app_secret='app_secret')

client = YZClient(token)

params={}

params['warehouse_code']="test"
params['version']=1540348974739
params['return_order_no']="201810241042540000010531"
params['retail_source']="GUANJIAPO"
params['remark']="test"

files=[]

print client.invoke('youzan.retail.open.returnorder.refuse', '3.0.0', 'POST', params=params, files=files)

'test', 'version' => '1540348974739', 'return_order_no' => '201810241042540000010531', 'retail_source' => 'GUANJIAPO', 'remark' => 'test', ]; $my_files = [ ]; echo '
';
var_dump(
    $client->post($method, $api_version, $my_params, $my_files)
);
echo '
';

name: refuse
desc: 拒绝退货（仅适用于有赞连锁）
